info.name: Dix Cards
info.attribution:
The game layout, images and library image are by LawDawg96 and BicycleIndividual and are released to the Public Domain under CC0.

The background picture by Dawn Hudson is in the Public Domain under CC0 and is available at https://publicdomainpictures.net/en/view-image.php?image=71643&picture=colourful-flame-background. It has been cropped and the colors modified.
info.description: Complete a series of levels by laying down cards in runs, sets, or colors. First to complete 10 levels wins.
info.helpText: Players take seats. Click Start Round button to begin and each player gets 10 cards. Play melds to holders next to your seat and discard in the holder next to the hand. When one player is down to 0 cards, a scoring button will appear. The score will be updated in the label below the seat. You can manually adjust the score if needed. The phase goal will also automatically update for all players that made a meld. Press the Start Round button to begin the next round.

fields.text: You're about to reset the board. Are you sure you want to continue?
You're about to complete this round.  This will calculate the score, recall the cards, and update the level each player is on.  Are you sure you want to continue?
